name: ShipShape (RetroTeabag)
description:
If sounds don't work please click in the game window, it's a weird browser thing.

Submitted for the Nokia 3310 Jam 4.

Survive waves of monsters while upgrading your ship! How long can you survive while your spaceship grows larger and larger...?

Menu Controls:

Navigate: Arrow Keys/WASD/Numpad 8,4,2,6
Accept: Enter/Numpad 5
Cancel: Esc/Numpad 0/Numpad -

Game Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys/WASD/Numpad 8,4,2,6
Shoot: Numpad 5/Spacebar/ J
Bombs: Numpad 0/Shift/ K
